Well, there is no such thing as "the best language" - one that would suit everyone, and would be so comfortable to use billions of people across the world would want to switch to it. And if something like that would exist, social inertia would assure the existence of other languages for a long, long time. Which would mean that during that time the "One Language" would splinter into many dialects, and they would evolve further - thus closing the circle. Nah. Not going to happen anytime soon.
